overview: Join Krankie, Gellax, Shiny and Schrodinger's Oscillator, for a dark, trash-pop tale of suspected murder, fabricated from physical and mental detritus found around the warehouses. A leaky landfill-spillage of lifestyle trends offer new ways of being together in this aggressively cathartic animated poem which pokes sexily at all our capitalist neuroses: productivity, overwhelm, loneliness and excess.
title: Uplands: Utopia I.O.U.
